messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Re: Mino Daido
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, they are the books to have. Gordon ... From: Ron Polansky [mailto:rpolansky@nihontophile.com] Sent: Thursday, May 08, 2003 11:10 AM To:
messages.messageBody:
Yes, they are the books to have.

Gordon
-----Original Message-----
From: Ron Polansky [mailto:rpolansky@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 08, 2003 11:10 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: Mino Daido


Gordon:

Thanks very much for looking it up/passing on the info.

I really want a set of the Zuikan. Last year I passed up the Shinto
volume which had a sword that went with it (it was the one in the
Zuikan). Neither the sword nor the book were cheap; both were,
however, excellent values. Wish I had bought both.

Best regards,
Ron P.

messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] Mino Daido
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Sorry I was a little slow in checking this out. The Minoto Taikan had a small sized oshigata and that compared very well. Even better was Nihonto
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Sorry I was a little slow in checking this out. The Minoto Taikan had a
small sized oshigata and that compared very well. Even better was Nihonto
Zuikan -- yes, if you do not have this set of books, you will never know
what you have. There were two, first gen. oshigata here and they both
matched very well, particularly the katana oshigata. So, my call -- genuine
signature of 1st. gen. Shinano no Kami Daido, circa Kanei.

Gordon
-----Original Message-----
From: Ron Polansky [mailto:yamabrp@...]
Sent: Monday, May 05, 2003 11:34 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Mino Daido


All:

I was wondering if someone had a Mino Taikon that had a matching mei:
Shinano (no) Kami Fujiwara Daido
http://www.nihontophile.com/Daido1.jpg (nakago rubbing)
http://www.nihontophile.com/Daido2.jpg (picture of blade)
(hada is tighter than most Mino I have seen)

I was wondering which generation?
(judging by the sori, etc., I was guessing 1st generation...blade
looks early Shinto)

Thanks for the help!
Ron
